requirements.summary: Promote Draft Version 106 to production deployment without code changes
acceptanceCriteria: The application previously deployed as Draft Version 106 is now live in production.
The production URL serves the latest build without requiring a draft preview link.
All frontend assets, backend canisters, and configurations from Draft Version 106 are reflected in the production environment.

file_operations.description: Update deployment documentation to reflect that Draft Version 106 has been promoted to production. Add a note documenting this deployment milestone with timestamp and version number for future reference.
